title: Episode 36 - The First Arab- Israeli War - Cold War in Middle East
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we examine the First Arab-Israeli war in the context of the Cold War. How did an Israel so outnumbered achieve victory? What was the Soviet Union's role in the war? How did the war effect the Cold War?
